description: Discover how Arbitrum, a Layer 2 solution for Ethereum, addresses scalability issues by reducing fees and congestion while maintaining security and decentralization. Learn about its benefits for DeFi, NFTs, and environmental impact.
keywords: Arbitrum, Layer 2, blockchain scalability, Ethereum, Optimistic Rollups, DeFi, NFTs, environmental impact, decentralization, security, transaction fees, ETH 2.0
title: Unlocking Blockchain's Potential: Arbitrum Layer 2
